actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution the Clerk of the House of Representatives requesting the Senate to return to the House the bill (S. 1210), with accompanying papers.

summary.text: Requests the Senate to return to the House the bill, S. 1210 (amending the Environmental Quality Improvement Act of 1970), together with accompanying papers.

titles.title: A resolution the Clerk of the House of Representatives requesting the Senate to return to the House the bill (S. 1210), with accompanying papers.
